tag_list: jantzen-fugate, direct-business-lending, streamlined-record-retrieval, entrepreneur, small-business, success, online-marketing
overview:
Jantzen Fugate, a 28 year old entrepreneur. A true sales and marketing professional, specializing in execution. Jantzen has seemingly limitless energy and an unbridled passion for business; which is reflected in his work. Jantzen is a natural entrepreneur. He understands people; he knows how to communicate messages that move them into action. Some would say this is manipulation, he calls it a natural talent.

At the age of 23 Jantzen started his first company, Streamlined Record Retrieval with his father, Scott Fugate. Streamlined Record Retrieval is the industry leader in providing online record retrieval services to the legal community.

At the age of 25 Jantzen started his second company, National Business Alliance, a complete Business-to-Business service provider. NBA’s main focus is to help educate and inspire entrepreneurs towards success. National Business Alliance’s family of products are very comprehensive and intuitive. They, along with their expert coaches give business owners the tools and resources they need to succeed.
